sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react" import { MDBCard, MDBCardImage, MDBCardBody, MDBCardTitle, MDBCardText, MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBContainer, MDBTypography, MDBAnimation, MDBBtn, MDBIcon, } from "mdb-react-ui-kit" import { teamData } from "../teamData" export default function TeamBio() { let bio1 = "" let phone1 = "" let email1 = "" let photo1 const name = localStorage.getItem("tm") let link; { teamData.map((data) => { if (data.name === localStorage.getItem("tm")) { return ( (phone1 = data.phone), (bio1 = data.bio), (email1 = data.email), (photo1 = data.photo) (link = data.email.substring(0,link.length-16)) ) } }) } return (

{name}

 Apply Now

Biography

{bio1}

Email Address:

{email1}

Phone Number:

{phone1}

Address:

17250 Dallas Parkway Dallas, TX 75248
 ) }
